Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventReceiver
public class Controller extends Object implements EventReceiver
Main Class of the Controller, one for each game

    • Controller

      public Controller(int playerNum, String firstPlayer, int idGame, boolean expert)
      Constructor of the Controller
      Parameters:
      playerNum - number of the player attended
      firstPlayer - first player nickname
      idGame - unique id of the game
      expert - boolean value for the expert mode activation
